# LibDNN

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES( .)
FILE( GLOB SRC_FILES *.c *.C )
FILE( GLOB HDR_FILES DNN/*.h )
ADD_LIBRARY(libDNN STATIC ${SRC_FILES} ${HDR_FILES} )

IF(UNIX)
  SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES( libDNN PROPERTIES 
	LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX 
  	COMPILE_FLAGS -fPIC
	LINK_FLAGS -Wl
	OUTPUT_NAME DNN )
ENDIF(UNIX)
